provisions.content:

     mantling of building and structures (whether permanent or not). in-
     cludmg (without prejudice to the foregoing) offshore installations, that is to

provisions.title: Section 5
provisions.content:
5 . Operations which form an integral part of, or are preparatory to, or are
     for rendering complete, such operations as are previously described in this
     Schedule including site clearance. earth-moving, excavation, tunnelling or
     boring, laying of foundations, erection of scaffolding, site restoration.
     landscaping and the provision of roadways and other access works.
